Name: Summer Rental
Title: Summer Rental
Desc: An overworked air-traffic controller takes his family on a beach vacation.
LongDescription: After air traffic controller Jack Chester loses a plane (it's covered on his screen by a fly), he's told to take a break. Jack books his family into a plush resort, but it turns out that their lodgings are in a hut by the beach, and that's as good as the vacation gets.
